A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It's a good film\, but as it's very predictable and formulaic\, I never really found it exciting or awe-inspiring.  Sure the locations and the cute little characters have changed but the tempo of the plot and the concepts are all so similar to what has gone before.  The music\, presentation and special effects are great\, but the lightsabre battle was lacking and some of the acting and dialogue was weak.
